channel.title: Physician and Herbalist Visit Bug
channel.description:
I was Princess and I willo-wisped, and only saw 1 visitor but was attacked but healed. I believe the Night The Physician heals someone successfully but also gets converted covers his visit during that night.
Here is a quote from Preston Harvey on steam forums to back this up:
“Actually I am pretty sure it is true. one time I had been healed by a phys and a alch and they both ended up trying to execute eachother because it only told me once. it went the alchemists side when it turned out the physician was converted the night he had healed me“

item.title: Physician and Herbalist Visit Bug
item.dc:creator: KyoDaz
item.description:
Me being attacked and healed when I wisped with only 1 visitor on N1 which was the sorcerer guarantees the Physician > Herbalist does not show the visit.

Read full topic

item.title: Physician and Herbalist Visit Bug
item.dc:creator: Frostwolf103
item.description:
Totally not bug, because either Alchemist or Physician get the message for healing succesful (and fake attacked but healed) the other receive that player doesn’t need healing

Read full topic

item.title: Physician and Herbalist Visit Bug
item.dc:creator: Insanity
item.description:
Your life is 100% a bug.

sorry

Read full topic

item.title: Physician and Herbalist Visit Bug
item.dc:creator: KyoDaz
item.description:
Oh well, but my game was 100% a bug

Read full topic

item.title: Physician and Herbalist Visit Bug
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
KyoDaz:

“Actually I am pretty sure it is true. one time I had been healed by a phys and a alch and they both ended up trying to execute eachother because it only told me once. it went the alchemists side when it turned out the physician was converted the night he had healed me“

This is actually irrelevant. They would only get 1 message no matter what. It was recently changed to be like that.

Read full topic

item.title: Physician and Herbalist Visit Bug
item.dc:creator: KyoDaz
item.description:
He visitor was the Sorcerer by the way.

Read full topic
